dcterms:creator: D. Drobin
R. G. Hahn
dcterms:description: This dataset involves the volume kinetics of Ringer's solution administered to hypovolemic volunteers, providing insights into fluid administration in critical care.
dcterms:title: Ringer's Solution in Hypovolemic Volunteers

dcterms:creator: N. R. Marques
et al.
dcterms:description: This dataset compares fuzzy logic and decision table controllers for automated closed-loop resuscitation of multiple hemorrhages in a sheep model.
dcterms:title: Automated closed-loop resuscitation of multiple hemorrhages

dcterms:creator: G. C. Kramer
et al.
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the closed-loop control of fluid therapy specifically for the treatment of hypovolemia.
dcterms:title: Closed-loop control of fluid therapy for treatment of hypovolemia

dcterms:creator: H. Mirinejad
et al.
dcterms:description: This dataset evaluates various fluid resuscitation control algorithms using a hardware-in-the-loop test bed.
dcterms:title: Evaluation of fluid resuscitation control algorithms

dcterms:creator: R. Bighamian
A. T. Reisner
J. Hahn
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a lumped-parameter subject-specific model that describes the blood volume response to fluid infusion.
dcterms:title: A lumped-parameter subject-specific model of blood volume response to fluid infusion

dcterms:creator: R. Bighamian
B. Parvinian
C. G. Scully
G. C. Kramer
J. Hahn
dcterms:description: This dataset involves control-oriented physiological modeling of hemodynamic responses to blood volume perturbation.
dcterms:title: Control-oriented physiological modeling of hemodynamic responses to blood volume perturbation

dcterms:creator: J. D. Mart√≠n-Guerrero
et al.
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a reinforcement learning approach for individualizing erythropoietin dosages in hemodialysis patients.
dcterms:title: Reinforcement learning approach for individualizing erythropoietin dosages in hemodialysis patients

dcterms:creator: H. Mirinejad
A. E. Gaweda
M. E. Brier
J. M. Zurada
T. Inanc
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on individualized drug dosing using the RBF-Galerkin method, specifically for anemia management in chronic kidney disease.
dcterms:title: Individualized drug dosing using RBF-Galerkin method

dcterms:creator: R. Padmanabhan
N. Meskin
W. M. Haddad
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a reinforcement learning-based control of drug dosing with applications to anesthesia and cancer therapy.
dcterms:title: Reinforcement learning-based control of drug dosing with applications to anesthesia and cancer therapy

dcterms:creator: E. Estiri
H. Mirinejad
dcterms:description: This dataset involves closed-loop control of mean arterial pressure in fluid resuscitation using reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Closed-loop control of mean arterial pressure in fluid resuscitation using reinforcement learning
